data.title: The Gods of Mars by Edgar Rice Burroughs: Very Good Hardcover (1918)
data.meta_description: Hardcover - Grosset & Dunlap - 1918 - Condition: Very Good - Very Good - Our copy probably a 1934 reprint with red covers, a green arc on the front and a green author label on the spine. Black lettering on cover and spine. Dark green top stain. Color dust jacket and B&W frontispiece by Frank E. Schoonover. Yellow back panel of jacket lists 34 ERB titles. Some dust soiling to bottom edge of text block. Pages yellowing. Light shelf rubbing to jacket, spine age darkening, with a little faint writing in pencil near upper spine and a pencil line and faint "2" on lower spine. Shallow chipping to spine head, mild wear to heel. There's a thin stain at the bottom edge of the back cover and dust jacket. (w) - The Gods of Mars
data.text:
About this Item

Our copy probably a 1934 reprint with red covers, a green arc on the front and a green author label on the spine. Black lettering on cover and spine. Dark green top stain. Color dust jacket and B&W frontispiece by Frank E. Schoonover. Yellow back panel of jacket lists 34 ERB titles. Some dust soiling to bottom edge of text block. Pages yellowing. Light shelf rubbing to jacket, spine age darkening, with a little faint writing in pencil near upper spine and a pencil line and faint "2" on lower spine. Shallow chipping to spine head, mild wear to heel. There's a thin stain at the bottom edge of the back cover and dust jacket. (w). Seller Inventory # 214340

Contact seller

Report this item

Avol's Books, LLC is an e-commerce business. We continue to buy fine used, rare and out-of-print books. All on-line purchases must be made through our internet partners like ABE. We are professional, full-time booksellers. We make every effort to accurately describe each book listed in our catalog. Customers are always welcome to inquire for specific information regarding a book. Your book orders will be carefully wrapped and shipped by our experienced staff. We can be reached at avolsbks@gmail.com or by calling 608-255-4730.

Terms of Sale:

Please refer to the terms of sale of our on-line partners like ABE. All books are shipped Media Rate unless otherwise requested. For single book orders, please include $5.00 for Media Rate shipping & handling and $10.60 for Priority Envelope shipping. Books too large to fit into a Flat Rate Priority Envelope will be charged based on the book's weight & your postal "zone." For oversize books or multi-book orders, please inquire for exact postage. International orders will be shipped via Priority ...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
